title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing spitting in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing spitting in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing spitting in a dream indicates bad talk, false talk, and hypocrisy, and spitting on the ground indicates buying new property, and seeing spitting in a dream is a lot of evidence in our area. Life, because spitting is the secretion of saliva or something else, and seeing a dream in a dream is slander, insults, bad words, and trouble. Follow us. We will tell you the most important interpretation of a dream about seeing spitting in a dream. A dream about seeing Ibn Sirin spitting A dream about spitting blood in a dream indicates that the dreamer will obtain illegal money. Spitting can indicate good or bad, and it can mean obtaining money or it may indicate slander. It indicates Seeing spit also indicates a long life. As for the interpretation of cold spit in a dream, it indicates death. Dry spit for an unmarried woman in a dream is also her inability to do many things and her poverty. Foam at the mouth in a dream indicates bad speech in reality. Interpretation of spitting on A car in a dream is a sign of far-reaching thinking. Interpretation of a dream about spitting in a dream and changing its color is evidence of a change in the viewer’s mood. Seeing spitting on the road indicates many good deeds and abundant money. Spitting in the home indicates financial stability for the family and an increase in the breadwinner’s income. Dream of seeing Ibn Shaheen SpitSeeing dry mouth from spit in a dream is a sign of poverty. Seeing spitting on the ground in a dream means buying land or real estate. Dream interpretation of black spit in a dream indicates anxiety and sadness, and yellow spit is evidence of illness. Interpretation of a dream about seeing spit for Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream about seeing spit In a dream, it is evidence of the presence of a strong man. Also, spitting with foam in a dream indicates lying and hypocrisy. Spitting in a dream also indicates the money that the dreamer will obtain. Dreaming of seeing spitting about a single woman. Interpretation of a brother or father spitting on a girl, and this indicates that she will get Money from her family and she feels happy. Seeing single women spitting in the street is evidence that they help the needy and cooperate with others. As for the interpretation of spitting at home for a girl, it shows that she did something to earn a lot of money that she spends at home. The interpretation of a dream of spitting for an unmarried woman in a dream indicates On the loss of her fiancé. Seeing spitting in large quantities in a dream indicates feelings of anxiety and sadness. Interpretation of a dream of spitting in the face by a young man and quarreling with him. This indicates an abundance of goodness and benefit from this young man, because it shows a close relationship. If a girl sees that her father or brother has Spitting on her, this indicates that she will have a lot of money and may indicate a joint project. Seeing spitting in a dream indicates canceling the engagement with the fiancé and may indicate the goodness that awaits her. Seeing a lot of spitting in a single woman’s dream can indicate many problems and fears. Seeing a girl spitting blood in her dream indicates many mistakes committed by the girl or forbidden money. Dreaming of seeing spitting about a married woman, and the interpretation of spitting in the face of a married woman is evidence that she took advantage of her husband’s money and lived with him alive.

title: Interpretation of seeing the number 16 in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a man

preview.html: What does the number 16 show? In a dream; Some interpreters say that if the dreamer sees the number 16 in a dream. This number is considered good news for its owners as it is always called the distinctive number. This number that the dreamer sees indicates goodness and happiness. That the dreamer's affairs are complete and perfect, whether it is a specific job or a high position that the dreamer reaches in his work. Also, if the dreamer sees the number 16 in his dream. This number indicates that the dreamer will perform the Hajj and Umrah. Other interpreters also interpreted seeing the number 16 in a dream. However, the dreamer is thinking about a specific thing that he wants to do, or wants to get. This dream indicates that the dreamer will get what he wants very soon. We have chosen for you: Interpretation of seeing the number 10 in a dream for a single woman, a married woman and a man Interpretation of the appearance of the number 16 in a dream about a single girl If a girl dreams that she has taken first place in her dream. This dream shows that the single girl exchanges love with everyone around her. As this dream is considered one of the good dreams for an unmarried girl. But if the girl sees The single woman that she got second place in her dream. This dream indicates that the unmarried girl will get married as soon as possible. Also, if a girl sees the number 16 in her dream. This dream indicates that this unmarried girl will be blessed by God with abundant sustenance. Also, if the girl who dreamed sees the number 16 in her dream. This number shows that the single girl feels safe and calm. If the girl who is engaged sees the number 16 in her dream. This number symbolizes the number of years that this engaged girl will spend with her husband. Also, if an unmarried girl sees the number 6 in her dream. This dream symbolizes that the engagement date of this single girl is very close. Interpretation of the appearance of the number 16 in a married woman's dream If a married woman sees the number 16 in her dream. This dream indicates that this married woman will soon become pregnant, God willing, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. Also, if this pregnant woman sees the number 16 in her dream. This dream indicates that this married woman is kind and courageous. If a married woman sees sick leave number in her dream 16. This dream indicates that the married woman will recover soon. This dream also symbolizes that the married woman will live a rich life. Similarly, if a married woman sees the number 6 in her dream. This dream indicates that the married woman feels joy and happiness. Interpretation of the number 16 in the dream of a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman sees the number 16 in her dream. This number shows the joy and happiness that the pregnant woman will get. Marriage numbers in general also indicate to the pregnant woman that it is possible for her to give birth to a male, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. But if a pregnant woman sees the number 8 in her dream. This number indicates that this pregnant woman will give birth to a beautiful girl, and God knows best. If a pregnant woman sees the number 7. This dream indicates that the pregnant woman will appear soon. If a pregnant woman sees the number 5 in her dream. This dream indicates the remaining months of pregnancy for this pregnant woman. From the

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a hole or wound in the head in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a wound in the head in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin narrated this vision: his head was injured in a dream and did not bleed, this indicates that the dreamer will get money. Seeing a wound in the head and blood flowing in a dream is one of the desired dreams and shows the dreamer the good and great blessings of God. Also, seeing More than one wound to the head is a sign of improved circumstances and also means a long life for him. If a person is hit on the head and the dreamer is smeared with his blood, this indicates that he has earned forbidden and illegal money. The interpretation of seeing a completely broken head in a dream is considered one of the unwanted dreams that indicate Until the term approaches. A head injury and the appearance of a bone and a skull in a dream are visions of losing a lot of money. Interpretation of a dream about a wound in the head for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing a wound in a dream for single women generally indicates instability in their lives and their exposure to an emotional crisis. Also, seeing a hole in a girl’s head is not Married woman in her dream indicates the great knowledge that she will gain from her studies. Seeing blood flowing from the wound on a girl’s head is a dream that indicates the end of areas and problems in her life. A head wound in a dream for a married woman. The interpretation of seeing a wound in the head in a dream for a married woman indicates some disagreements that She faced her with her husband during this time. Seeing blood flowing in a dream for a married woman indicates the end of her troubles and relieves her of some of the burdens that were holding her back. Seeing her husband hitting his head in a dream and getting injured, this indicates his betrayal of him and his lack of faith in her husband. Interpretation of a dream about having a hole in the head. A hole in a person’s head in a dream and insects coming out of it indicates that he has a large number of bad thoughts. Seeing a hole in the head and a snake coming out of it is a sign of many prohibited actions and misfortunes. Interpretation of a dream about something coming out of the head indicates money flowing from a person’s head In a dream, it means that he is busy and is pursuing things that do not benefit his life, but rather bring him back. Seeing water coming out of one’s head in a dream indicates goodness and benevolence and is a sign of good morals. Interpretation of a dream about an open head: Seeing an open head and the brain coming out of it in a dream indicates some difficult things. Which the dreamer is going through during this time. Also, seeing an animal’s head opened in a dream is considered one of the dreams that indicate benefits, gifts, and abundant livelihood and money for that person. Seeing an open head in a dream indicates the occurrence of difficult stages and overcoming the problems and obstacles that the owner suffers from. Dream.If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of Surat Al-Rahman in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of Surat Al-Rahman in a dream in detail.The Holy Qur’an is the final word sent by the Prophet Muhammad, and it contains many Qur’anic series, the most important of which, may God bless him and grant him peace, including the Qur’an, one interprets it and tries to explore what Ibn Shirin and Ibn Shaheen offer. This opportunity, and I see many different things in my dreams. You may also be interested in: Penguin in a dreamInterpretation of Surat Ar-Rahman in a dream in detailInterpretation of Surat Ar-Rahman in a dream in detailIbn Sirin says that a man’s recitation of Surat Ar-Rahman in a dream is evidence of the many good deeds and blessings that she has received in her life. Your life. Watching the recitation of Surah Ar-Rahman at home is evidence of Satan’s blessing and protection, the ease of the matter and the removal of obstacles and problems in life, and seeing it read to the sick is evidence of a speedy recovery. Seeing men memorizing Surah Ar-Rahman for their children, this vision is a good introduction to protecting children and the opportunity to educate them, as well as morals The praiseworthy God and the insight of God Almighty. You may also be interested in: Washing the dead. Interpretation of seeing Surah Ar-Rahman in a dream. According to scholars who interpret the dream of an unmarried girl, the decision of Surah Ar-Rahman is evidence of elegance and rich living, a great improvement in life and positive changes in the situation. But when an unmarried girl sees it A married woman listens to Surat Ar-Rahman without rest. This vision is evidence that the girl is striving for something, which is God Almighty, and she will achieve it, God willing. You may be interested: Seeing 500 riyals in a dream. Interpretation of seeing Surat Ar-Rahman in a married woman’s dream. Ibn Shaheen said that seeing a married woman reading Surat Ar-Rahman is a sign On goodness and the blessing of life, happiness and stability. But when you see a woman reciting Surat Al-Rahman to her children, this is evidence of goodness and her children will occupy a great position in this world. It also means the blessing of life and the ability to achieve life goals and aspirations. If you see a woman who cannot read or listen to Surah Ar-Rahman, this is an unpleasant vision. It shows the difficult problems that you are going through, and He is all-powerful and can indicate that you are far from the path of God. Researcher Ibn Shaheen says that reading Surat Al-Rahman in a dream may indicate that the dreamer is exposed to a conspiracy from the enemy, but he is all-powerful, so defeat them with the help of others and do not They suffer from them. Also, the interpretation of reading Surat Al-Rahman in a dream may mean that the person having this vision will soon move to the Sacred House of God or to Jerusalem. If the dreamer feels pain, sorrow, and illness and sees Surah Al-Rahman recited in a dream, this indicates the mercy of God Almighty and his deliverance from misery and sadness by order. God Almighty, whoever wants to get sick is a disease. You may be interested: Talking with the dead in a dreamInterpretation of seeing Surah Ar-Rahman in a single or married woman’s dreamMany dream interpreters argue that reading Surah Ar-Rahman in a dream indicates the approaching marriage and entry into a new life if the dreamer is an unmarried girl But if the dreamer is a married woman and sees Surat Al-Rahman recited in a dream, then the dream indicates the happiness of this woman who lives with her husband.

title: What is the interpretation and importance of seeing a woman in a dream by leading scholars?

preview.html: The appearance of a woman in a dream and its interpretationWomen are considered among the most sensitive creatures on earth, and therefore if they are seen in a dream, they indicate many different meanings and connotations, because they are often praiseworthy visions for many, and many dream interpretation scholars have narrated their different opinions in Seeing a woman in a dream and what it means, and this is what we will tell you in the following lines. Interpretation of seeing a woman in a dream When an old woman appears, who is tall and of great beauty, this is a sign for the dreamer that he will get what he wants. If she is an old lady and she is looking at him and smiling, then this It means that the dreamer will repent to God for many sins that he has committed in reality, and he is drawing closer to God and the prayers that the dreamer performs. It will happen, God willing. Seeing a woman wearing black in a dream. If she looks feminine and wears black, it is a sign of health and coverage, especially if she is a fan of this color. And if the dreamer sees a group of women wearing black clothes, and they are short and do not cover them, this means The dreamer is far from the teachings of his religion, disobeys God Almighty and commits many sins, and he must. Repent from this sin. Seeing a beautiful woman in a dream: If he sees a very beautiful woman, and she looks at him and smiles at him, then this is a sign that he will achieve great goodness, and if he is young and unmarried, then this is a sign that his marriage is approaching. The near future, but if he is sick with some disease in his digestive system, this means that his death is near, and the witnesses will write it down, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If you have a dream and do not find its interpretation, go to Google and write an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Seeing a beautiful girl in a dreamIf he saw her and she was very beautiful , but she was very fat, this indicates that the dreamer will make a lot of money in the near future and will be in better condition, and God will give her from where she works. They do not count, and this goodness belongs to her and her husband. If instead he sees a beautiful girl, but she is skinny or very thin in body, then this is a bad dream for her and evidence that she will suffer from poverty and misery and will face many problems. Seeing a woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer’s vision of a woman in a dream as a sign of many good things that will happen in his life in the coming days as a result of his fear of God Almighty in all his actions. If a person sees a woman in his dream, this is a sign that he has achieved Many wonderful achievements in many aspects of his life and he will be very proud of what he will achieve. If the dreamer sees women during his sleep, this means that he will receive a lot of money that will make him live his life the way he likes. Seeing the dreamer in a dream for a woman symbolizes positive changes that It will happen in many aspects of his life, which will be very satisfying for him. If a man sees a woman in his dream, this is a sign of good news that will reach his ears and spread a lot of joy and happiness around him.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing wind or wind in a dream

preview.html: Dream Interpretation To see wind or wind in a dream, a person may be exposed to a health problem or may be exposed to intestinal confusion as a result of eating large amounts of food or not digesting food well due to eating too quickly, or for any other reason, and this can cause the accumulation of gases in the abdomen Thus, the appearance of an unpleasant odor causes harm to the person and those around him, and in this context we explain the indicators. Interpretation of the dream of seeing fart or fart in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing fart or fart in a dream. The passing of wind is considered one of the things that invalidates ablution and prayer, and the Muslim in this case must repeat the ablution and then Prayer begins, and in addition, the Prophet Muhammad - may God bless him and grant him peace - urged Muslims to avoid. Air passes between people, but you should probably do it in the bathroom to avoid hurting others. Bad smell. In this article we remind you of the indicators. Interpretation of a dream about seeing wind or wind in a dream: When a person sees wind or wind in his dream, this is a sign of bad speech that includes bad meanings. Perhaps it is indicated by words that carry meanings of humiliation, humiliation, and slavery. It is said that in the interpretation of wind That which blows in a dream is an ordeal and affects the dreamer. Whereas if a person farts among a group of people or on an occasion, it indicates the distress and tension that a group of people is in, including the fortuneteller. But the wind that blows involuntarily In a dream among people, it indicates the end of anxiety, the death of sadness, and the relief of distress in the dreamer’s life. If wind comes out of the anus intentionally and smells bad, this indicates the fortuneteller’s bad reputation. It also indicates the misbehavior of the visionary. And if a woman sees An unmarried woman in a dream farts with feces, this means that she will get rid of all the crises, obstacles and fears that have dominated her life. Whereas seeing malice among people in a dream shows the bad nature of single people. But if this is done unintentionally and unintentionally, it shows her that she She will be freed from the problems she suffers from in life. If a single woman sees someone she knows passing the air while she is sitting, this indicates the intensity of his love for her and his desire to get close to her without her knowledge. title: 7 signs indicating the presence of a Kalashnikov rifle in a dream, learn about them in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a Kalashnikov Some people buy it to protect themselves from any harm or damage. There are many types and each has a specific use. It is one of the dreams that most people see in their sleep. It has many meanings and connotations and has many interpretations, some of which indicate good and in other cases it may indicate evil that a person may encounter in his life. In this article, we will discuss the matter in detail. Interpretation of a dream about a Kalashnikov Interpretation of a dream about a Kalashnikov rifle in a dream and a large number of people were around him and looking at him, and this indicates that there are people who do not like him and are jealous of him and want to deprive him of the blessing. Seeing a girl carrying a Kalashnikov rifle in a dream means that she will get a lot of money, increase her financial and social status, and can achieve many achievements. Seeing a girl carrying a Kalashnikov rifle shows that she feels comfortable and safe and that she has a body free of diseases. Ibn Sirin's interpretation of a dream about a Kalashnikov rifle If the fortuneteller sees a group of people who are not carrying a weapon and he is carrying a Kalashnikov, this is a sign of his ability to lead. If the dreamer resides abroad and sees a Kalashnikov in his dream, this indicates that his return from the trip is approaching. Seeing a Kalashnikov rifle in his dream, and in reality he suffers from a lack of livelihood and accumulates debts on him. This is one of the good visions for him, because God Almighty will earn him a lot of money and improve his social conditions. Ibn Sirin interprets the dream of a Kalashnikov rifle in a dream as a sign of the recovery of the dreamer who complained of some pain. Interpretation of a dream of a single woman with a Kalashnikov rifle If an unmarried woman sees herself buying a Kalashnikov rifle in a dream, this means that she will soon marry a man who holds a high position and has a reputation among people. Seeing a girl injured with a Kalashnikov rifle in her dream symbolizes that the people around her are talking badly about her and hating her. Interpretation of a dream of a Kalashnikov rifle for a single woman is a sign that she feels comfortable and happy at the present time. Seeing a single girl carrying a Kalashnikov rifle in her dream shows the extent of her love for a clear mind and a strong and dominant personality, making the right fateful decisions and her ability to achieve everything she wants. Interpretation of a dream of a married woman with a Kalashnikov rifle Interpretation of a dream of a married woman with a Kalashnikov rifle in a dream indicates the extent of love and the relationship between her and her family and the feeling of joy and peace of mind. Seeing a married woman putting a Kalashnikov rifle in a dream indicates that she is currently feeling comfortable And security in her life. Interpretation of a dream of a pregnant woman with a Kalashnikov rifle Seeing a pregnant woman carrying a Kalashnikov rifle in her dream means that she will give birth easily and smoothly without experiencing any problems or difficulties. If a pregnant woman hears the sound of a shot from a Kalashnikov rifle in her dream, this means that God Almighty will take care of her and she and her fetus will be in good health. Interpretation of a dream of a shooter with a Kalashnikov rifle If a divorced woman sees herself carrying a Kalashnikov rifle in a dream, this symbolizes that she is always protecting herself so that she does not hear words from people that harm her self

title: Interpretation of seeing houses destroyed and destroyed in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen.

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing ruined and destroyed houses in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen. The fortuneteller sees in real life or on the property of someone he knows and is close to him some frightening dreams that make the person feel that he will soon lose something valuable, so in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing destroyed houses and perishing in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the demolition of houses in a dream Interpretation by Ibn Sirin The famous interpreter Ibn Sirin believes that houses in a dream symbolize their people. He adds that any good that happens in a dream about houses is a sign of the good that the dreamer will receive in reality. But if the houses are exposed to evil, then this The dream does not bode well, as it is evidence that the people of the house are also exposed to evil. If the dreamer finds that his house has been destroyed while he is inside, this is a sign that he will die inside that house in reality. Other jurists in the field of dream interpretation said that demolishing a house in a dream is good news. come true for the pioneer. They considered this strong evidence of the many changes that the dreamer will experience in his life, and they will be for the better. Also, if one sees his home destroyed while he is abroad, this indicates that he will soon obtain large sums of money. The destruction of another person’s home by the dreamer indicates in The dream indicates the great benefit or money that he will receive from the owner of that house. This dream could be a reflection of the dreamer’s feeling of despair, loneliness, and sadness, and his entry into a bad psychological state in reality. The complete destruction of the house and the surprise of the dreamer in the dream is a sign that he will get into many problems. Difficult, God forbid. Interpretation of the dream of seeing houses being demolished in a dream. Interpretation of Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi agrees with the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, where he sees that the destruction of a house in a dream is a dream that does not bode well at all. If the dreamer sees in his dream that his house has been destroyed while he is inside it, this is a sign of He is in many crises. This dream may be a sign of his death inside this house. If houses are destroyed by strong winds and storms, this is a sign of his death or the death of one of his family members, God forbid. The interpretation of a dream about seeing houses being demolished in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of Ibn Shaheen differs. On the interpretation of both Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin, where: Ibn Shaheen believes that seeing a destroyed house does not always mean that it is bad. He pointed out that seeing destroyed houses in some cases is evidence of the abundance of money that the dreamer will obtain in reality. Also, the dreamer’s dream of destroying other people’s houses It is good news that he will obtain many benefits and money. The ceiling that falls on the dreamer in a dream is a sign of the abundance of money that he will obtain in reality. Interpretation of the dream of seeing destroyed houses in a dream for a single woman. This dream does not bode well for an unmarried woman in a dream. It may be A sign of losing a loved one from the family, God forbid. Sometimes this dream is a sign that you will fall into many difficult crises and problems. For a single woman to see that a group of people...

He pointed out that seeing destroyed houses in some cases is evidence of the abundance of money that the dreamer will obtain In fact. And the roof that falls on the dreamer in the dream is a sign of the abundance of money that he will get in reality. It may be a sign of losing a loved one from the family, God forbid. Sometimes this dream is a sign that you will fall into many crises and difficult problems. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a mosque in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a mosque in a dream and seeing a mosque indicates piety, justice, piety, and the end of worry and anxiety. A mosque without prayer shows problems and fears in his life. The meanings of the dream of seeing a mosque and the interpretation of seeing a mosque in a dream indicates the status expected later, and from his point of view, building a mosque indicates religion, faith, and following the Sunnah, and that he will obtain a great position and advancement in it. Profession: When you see the entrance to the mosque with a group of people, this indicates the approach of marriage, and for those who have never married, when interpreting the dream of seeing the mosque in a dream, this indicates reverence, honor, and good morals. . As an encouraging commodity. He forbade evil and good intentions. A married woman dreams of seeing the mosque. When she sees the mosque in a dream that she is getting married, this indicates that she is living happily with a lot of money or that God is blessing her with a male son. And if you see that he is praying in the mosque, this indicates psychological comfort, reassurance, and eating a lot. Interpretation Seeing sitting inside the mosque: If a pregnant woman sees that she is sitting in the mosque, this indicates abundant nutrition, imminent birth, safety, and ease of birth. Let this child have broad and extensive knowledge of religion. If a girl is seen sitting in the mosque listening to the Qur’an or attending religious lessons, this indicates that he will marry, achieve big dreams, and live abundantly, and this is also an interpretation for a young man who has never married. The dream of seeing the mosque by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the mosque in a dream by Ibn Sirin, and this indicates a high position. In the afterlife, Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the mosque is that it refers to the Holy Kaaba because the mosque is the house of God and the house of the Kaaba as well. This indicates reward, reward, profit and benefit, as well as love of religion and closeness to God. Dream of seeing a mosque in a dream When you see building a mosque in a dream, this indicates religiosity or marriage. Building a new life, apart from being a sign of distinction and success, and for those who have a job or project, it indicates the fortuneteller’s ability to earn a living and save money. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a friend in the mosqueThe mosque in a dream is a good vision that indicates justice, piety, good work, and facilitation. Position and fulfillment of evils. Good social relations and seeing the mosque with loved ones indicates the abundance of goodness that awaits him in his life, which makes him live a life free of sadness and anguish. The vision indicates the fulfillment of all the ambitions and dreams that one had planned in advance. To see someone praying with someone whose lineage is known among the righteous, means that his supplication will be received, the matter will be completed, and stress and anxiety will go away, even if he has a debt that God has paid for him. Dreaming of seeing a mosque with someone I know. Seeing him entering the mosque with someone indicates that the young man will obtain the position of judge or a prestigious position. Seeing her entering the mosque accompanied by someone indicates that her marriage is approaching. Entering the mosque indicates the fulfillment of dreams and desires. Dreaming of seeing a mosque for a married man. Seeing entering A mosque in a man’s dream means abundant sustenance and abundance of companionship. It also indicates an increase in the profits of a merchant, factory, or farmer. Entering a mosque for married couples indicates the birth of
